actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade

official_title: To provide for notification to consumers before a video service collects visual or auditory information from the viewing area and to provide consumers with choices that do not involve the collection of such information, and for other purposes.
short_title: We Are Watching You Act of 2013

titles.title: We Are Watching You Act of 2013

To provide for notification to consumers before a video service collects visual or auditory information from the viewing area and to provide consumers with choices that do not involve the collection of such information, and for other purposes.
